issuing_country.description: The name of the issuing country - ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

identifier.description: Serial number - A unique serial number identifying the Certificate

lot_number.description: The exporter's unique lot number or export order number for the lot

designated_mineral_description.description: A description of the Designated Mineral, including the type of ore or concentrate, weight and grade of the lot

lot_weight.description: Lot Weight - Numeric format, accepting fractional value

lot_weight_uom.description: Lot Weight Unit of Measure - The unit of measure shall be chosen from UN/ECE Recommendation NÂ°. 20 'Codes for Units of Measure Used in International Trade'

lot_grade.description: Lot Grade - Grade expression might vary depending on the mineral

mineral_origin.description: The national origin of the material - One or more country identifiers (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2), separated by one space character (e.g., 'CD BI RW')

customs_value.description: The declared Customs value in USD of the Lot. Use Currency code of 3 letters (ISO 4217) and value Decimal format, separated by one space character. Alternatively, it can be Decimal considering that it should always be given in USD

date_of_shipment.description: The date the lot is planned to be shipped

shipment_route.description: The shipment route - ISO 3166 alpha-2 (array of countries separated by comma without spaces, e.g., 'CD,TZ,BI') or array of ISO 3166 alpha-2 and ISO 3166 alpha-3

transport_company.description: The transport company responsible for transporting the shipment, if known

name_of_verifier.description: Name of the Member State representative responsible for verifying the documentation and recommending the issuance of an ICGLR Regional Certificate

position_of_verifier.description: Position of the Member State representative responsible for verifying the documentation

id_of_verifier.description: Identification number (where available) of the Member State representative responsible for verification

date_of_verification.description: The date the lot is verified by the Member State representative

name_of_validator.description: The name of the Member State representative empowered to countersign the Certificate to render it valid

date_of_issuance.description: The date that the Certificate is countersigned (Certificate is valid from this date)

date_of_expiration.description: The date that the Certificate expires, or the validity period of the Certificate

certificate_file.description: The certificate as file (file reference or URL)
